title: The Summer Movie Awards | The Watch
description:
In a 'Big Picture'–'Watch' crossover bonus episode, The Ringer’s Sean Fennessey and Chris Ryan highlight this summer’s movies by awarding the biggest surprises, best independent films, best scenes, best and worst movie of the summer, and much more.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
